T02TD2181E:38a-0: @38a * // bsdus pa las kyi sbyor ka ni //
T02TD2181E:38a-1: thun mong cho ga thams cad ni //
T02TD2181E:38a-2: gong ma bzhin du shes byas la //
T02TD2181E:38a-3: brko zhing bru ba ma nus pas //
T02TD2181E:38a-4: mandala bdud rtsis byugs nas su//
T02TD2181E:38a-5: tshon rnams kyis ni bri bar bya //
T02TD2181E:38a-6: de nas cho ga rdzogs bya'o //
T02TD2181E:38a-7: shin tu bsdus pa'i sbyor ka ni //
T02TD2181E:38a-8: mandala byas la me tog dgram //
T02TD2181E:38a-9: skad cig lhar bskyed byin brlabs la //
T02TD2181E:38a-10: bsrung ba'i cho ga byas nas ni //
T02TD2181E:38a-11: cho ga la sogs rdzogs bya'o //
T02TD2181E:38a-12: khyad par zhi ba dngul dngul dang ni //
T02TD2181E:38a-13: khar ba dag ni shis pa ste ;
T02TD2181E:38a-14: / rgyas pa'i gser dang ra gan dang //
T02TD2181E:38a-15: dbang gi zangs la drag po'i lcags //
T02TD2181E:38a-16: khyi yi thod pa'ang bya bar gsungs //
T02TD2181E:38a-17: dbyibs rnams so sor byas pa'am //
T02TD2181E:38a-18: yang na bsams te byas pa'o //
T02TD2181E:38a-19: de rnams rnyed par ma gyur na //
T02TD2181E:38a-20: sa ni rin chen dang 'dra bas //
T02TD2181E:38a-21: kham phor snod rnams kun la ni //
T02TD2181E:38a-22: so so'i dbyibs ni byas pa dang //
T02TD2181E:38a-23: bsams te byin gyis brlabs byas la //
T02TD2181E:38a-24: cho ga la sogs rdzogs bya'o //
T02TD2181E:38a-25: sbyin sreg las kyi sbyor ka rnams //
T02TD2181E:38a-26: rna bar brgyud pa'i rim pa yis //
T02TD2181E:38a-27: rgyud la gab pa'i don rnams kun //
T02TD2181E:38a-28: bdag gis sgrub pa po la bstan //
T02TD2181E:38a-29: 'di bstan pa yi dge bas ni //
T02TD2181E:38a-30: thams cad byang chub thob par shog / sbyin sreg las kyi cho ga / slob dpon bha bas mdzad pa rdzogs so//
